message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can work out a better deal later.
I'm not afraid of being fair, but I think I deserve a bigger share this time. Let's see if you agree.
Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to give up a bit more, but I still need a good share to cover the inflation.
You're giving up more than I did last time, but I'm still not convinced this is a good deal for me. I'll give you a chance to sweeten the pot.
I'm starting to feel the pressure of inflation, but I'm still willing to negotiate. This is my final offer before I risk losing even more. Let's find a compromise.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a compromise. I'll make a bold move and see if you'll meet me halfway.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but this is the absolute lowest I can go. It's a tough decision, but I think it's better than losing more money to inflation.
